speaker: Nora
text: Looking back... we should have re-evaluated our priorities right after the second sprint.
ipa: ˈlʊkɪŋ bæk... wi ʃʊd həv ˌriːɪˈvæljueɪtɪd aʊɚ praɪˈɔɹətiz ɹaɪt ˈæftɚ ðə ˈsɛkənd spɹɪnt.
stress: LOOKING BACK... we SHOULD have RE-EVALUATED our PRIORITIES right AFTER the SECOND SPRINT.
linking:
"should have" → /ʃʊd həv/ (d + h linking)
"right after" → /ɹaɪt ˈæftɚ/ (t + a linking)

speaker: Elias
text: Absolutely. If we had cut that chatbot feature earlier, we could have saved the entire mobile rewrite.
ipa: ˌæbsəˈlutli. ɪf wi hæd kʌt ðæt ˈtʃætˌbɑt ˈfiːtʃɚ ˈɝliɚ, wi kʊd həv seɪvd ði ɪnˈtaɪɚ ˈmoʊbəl ˈɹiːˌɹaɪt.
stress: ABSOLUTELY. If we had CUT that CHATBOT FEATURE EARLIER, we COULD have SAVED the ENTIRE MOBILE REWRITE.
linking:
"had cut" → /hæd kʌt/ (d + c linking)
"could have" → /kʊd həv/ (d + h linking)

speaker: Nora
text: And I wish I had pushed back harder on the unrealistic deadlines.
ipa: ænd aɪ wɪʃ aɪ hæd pʊʃt bæk ˈhɑɹdɚ ɑn ði ˌʌnɹiəˈlɪstɪk ˈdɛdlaɪnz.
stress: And I WISH I had PUSHED BACK HARDER on the UNREALISTIC DEADLINES.
linking:
"had pushed" → /hæd pʊʃt/ (d + p linking)
"pushed back" → /pʊʃt bæk/ (t + b linking)

speaker: Elias
text: Yeah… If only we had aligned better with product from the start.
ipa: jæ… ɪf ˈoʊnli wi hæd əˈlaɪnd ˈbɛtɚ wɪð ˈpɹɑdəkt fɹəm ðə stɑɹt.
stress: Yeah… If ONLY we had ALIGNED BETTER with PRODUCT from the START.
linking:
"had aligned" → /hæd əˈlaɪnd/ (d + a linking)
"from the" → /fɹəm ðə/ (m + th linking)

speaker: Nora
text: Also, if we weren’t so focused on shipping fast, we would have spent more time on architecture.
ipa: ˈɔlsoʊ, ɪf wi ˈwɝnt soʊ ˈfoʊkəst ɑn ˈʃɪpɪŋ fæst, wi wʊd həv spɛnt mɔɹ taɪm ɑn ˈɑɹkəˌtɛktʃɚ.
stress: ALSO, if we WEREN’T so FOCUSED on SHIPPING FAST, we WOULD have SPENT more TIME on ARCHITECTURE.
linking:
"weren’t so" → /ˈwɝnt soʊ/ (t + s linking)
"would have" → /wʊd həv/ (d + h linking)

speaker: Elias
text: Definitely. If I hadn't skipped those early design syncs, we might have prevented the late-stage chaos.
ipa: ˈdɛfənətli. ɪf aɪ ˈhædənt skɪpt ðoʊz ˈɝli dɪˈzaɪn sɪŋks, wi maɪt həv pɹɪˈvɛntɪd ðə ˈleɪtˌsteɪdʒ ˈkeɪɑs.
stress: DEFINITELY. If I HADN'T SKIPPED those EARLY DESIGN SYNCS, we MIGHT have PREVENTED the LATE-STAGE CHAOS.
linking:
"hadn't skipped" → /ˈhædənt skɪpt/ (t + s linking)
"might have" → /maɪt həv/ (t + h linking)

speaker: Nora
text: To be honest, I wish we had encouraged more cross-team communication too.
ipa: tu bi ˈɑnəst, aɪ wɪʃ wi hæd ɪnˈkɝɪdʒd mɔɹ ˈkɹɔsˌtim kəˌmjunəˈkeɪʃən tu.
stress: To be HONEST, I WISH we had ENCOURAGED more CROSS-TEAM COMMUNICATION too.
linking:
"had encouraged" → /hæd ɪnˈkɝɪdʒd/ (d + e linking)
"cross-team" → /ˈkɹɔsˌtim/ (s + t linking)

speaker: Elias
text: Same. We shouldn’t have assumed everyone was on the same page.
ipa: seɪm. wi ˈʃʊdənt həv əˈsumd ˈɛvɹiˌwʌn wəz ɑn ðə seɪm peɪdʒ.
stress: SAME. We SHOULDN’T have ASSUMED EVERYONE was on the SAME PAGE.
linking:
"shouldn’t have" → /ˈʃʊdənt həv/ (t + h linking)
"on the" → /ɑn ðə/ (n + th linking)

speaker: Nora
text: Next time... as long as we prioritize sustainability, the team will avoid burnout like this.
ipa: nɛkst taɪm... æz lɔŋ æz wi praɪˈɔɹəˌtaɪz səˌsteɪnəˈbɪləti, ðə tim wɪl əˈvɔɪd ˈbɝnˌaʊt laɪk ðɪs.
stress: NEXT TIME... as LONG as we PRIORITIZE SUSTAINABILITY, the TEAM will AVOID BURNOUT like THIS.
linking:
"as long as" → /æz lɔŋ æz/ (z + l linking)
"will avoid" → /wɪl əˈvɔɪd/ (l + a linking)

speaker: Elias
text: Agreed. And hey — we might have failed, but we definitely learned.
ipa: əˈɡɹid. ænd heɪ — wi maɪt həv feɪld, bət wi ˈdɛfənətli lɝnd.
stress: AGREED. And HEY — we MIGHT have FAILED, but we DEFINITELY LEARNED.
linking:
"might have" → /maɪt həv/ (t + h linking)
"but we" → /bət wi/ (t + w linking)
